objects.text:
• BREATHABLE MESH MATERIAL
• SHOCK ABSORBING BLADE SOLE
• HONEYCOMB INSOLE DESIGN
• ALL-DAY COMFORT SUPPORT

product_details.description: 【UPPER】Fashion knitted mesh material and lightweight support maximizes the upper and let your foot always keeps dry and cool. 【OUTSOLES】The sole Is made of hollow carved technology, providing stable support and optimal shock absorption for sport. 【INSOLE】The insole adopt honeycomb hole design, Keep your feet balanced and protect your ankle ,tongues and feet from hurt. 【Applications】Better for working, training, running, walking, tennis, athletic, gym, sports, golf, indoor & outdoot, hiking, camping, climbing, travel, etc. The shoes adopt stylish color scheme gives you a different visual experience. Breathable and durable. Simple style, all-match colors, can be match any clothing. Fabric type - Mesh ** Sole material - Rubber ** Outer material - Rubber ** Closure type - Pull-On **

banner_details:
This banner features a quadrant layout with a clean, modern design promoting athletic sneakers. The top-left quadrant includes the main title (id: "heading"), a sleek subheading (id: "subheading"), and a descriptor tagline (id: "tagline") stacked vertically. The top-right quadrant showcases a large product image (id: "product_image") of the featured shoes, prominently placed for visual appeal. The bottom-left quadrant lists key features in bullet format (id: "description") and highlights an eye-catching price (id: "price"). The bottom-right quadrant incorporates a distinct call-to-action button (id: "cta") on a black rounded rectangle background (id: "cta_background"). The background features vibrant color blocks, subtle curved divider lines, and geometric accents for added depth.

**Color Palette:**
- Teal: #09BFB8  
- Deep Teal: #00857F  
- White: #FFFFFF  
- Black: #000000 (for CTA button)  
- Light Grey/White overlays (used in geometric background accents)
product_color: The product image features a dynamic and eye-catching color palette centered around a vibrant teal blue (#1FC1C3) as the dominant hue for the shoe body and sole. This bold tone conveys energy and freshness, suitable for sporty, youthful branding. Accents of deep black (#111111) are used for structural elements and typography ("JUST SO SO"), creating strong contrast and emphasizing high-impact wording. The subtle mesh texture of the fabric softly blends lighter shades of teal, adding depth and a woven aesthetic. The overall composition balances color vibrancy with readability, making teal and black the ideal colors for a modern, energetic banner design.
